"M2K Technologies is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when using our app.

 1. Data Collection: This app may collect data to enhance user experience and enable personalized ads. No personal data such as contacts or messages is collected.

 2. Personalized Ads: We may work with third-party providers to display ads based on your app usage preferences. You can control ad personalization settings within the app.

 3. Storage Permissions: The app requires permission to access storage for saving media. This permission is solely for the app’s core functionality.

 4. Data Security: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access. However, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

 5. Third-Party Services: Our app may integrate with services provided by third-party partners. Please refer to their privacy policies for additional details.

 6. Changes to Privacy Policy: M2K Technologies reserves the right to modify this policy. Users will be notified of significant changes.

 For inquiries about this policy, please email m2kmediake@gmail.com.
